text: "Ye Brahmin hai.. maaro..maaro ise.. Mere kapde faade... Meri video banayi.. Jab tak main behosh nahi hone lagi tab tak mujhe maarte rahe." - Journalist Ruchi Tiwari who was groped and attacked by pro UGC protesters in DU. source :
Labour office lo money esthe vallu company ki support chestharu

Sir enoda last company enaku reliving letter and experience letter kuduka matingaranga. Moreover june and july months matum tha company la eruntha , july 28 relieve ayitan. June month matum tha salary kuduthanga, july ku kudukala. Avanka work join pana munadi night shift pathi solala, aana join pani 5 days aporom solranga. Resign panitu exp and reliving letter keta kudukama na 10lakhs recovery amount kudutha release panranu solranga. Advocate vechu legal notice anupuna, 2 weeks mela achu epo var

Na 15 days vela pathe sir....ye family situation nala enala continue panna mudila..solitutha discontinue panne...but work pathathuku salary ketta ipa thara mudiyathu un istathuku velaiya vittu nippa ye istathuku tha na salary kudupenu solraga...enaku yeppa kuduka thonutho kudupenraga
Sir na police complaint kuduta sir no response sir avagaluku tha sir support panraga
